page.title: 18LITTLE PARNDON JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: { Built in 1956 and now caters for 100 boys and 92 girls. The teaching staff consists of one Headteacher and seven teachers, plus two part-time teachers. There is one secretary, three welfare assistants, four midday assistants to help at dinner-times, a cook and four kitchen staff, one caretaker and two cleaners. The following list of activities held in the school hall tell you a lot of what happens in school: assemblies, singing and concert prac- ticies, school dinners, country danc- ing and movement, gymnastics, book club, badminton, Brownies, PTA meet- ings, visiting theatre groups, games, Christmas Bazaars, exhibitions and discos.
